articles.title: Microsoft's OG Surface Duo is unbelievably cheap for a limited time (new with warranty) - PhoneArena
articles.description: Unveiled in 2019 and released in 2020, Microsoft's first-gen Surface Duo is more attractive than ever in 2022 at an insanely low price of $249.99 brand new.
